DOC.brief_summary: Constipation common disorder current treatment unsatisfactory . Biofeedback may help patient constipation dyssynergic defecation , efficacy unproven whether due behavioral modification excessive attention unknown . Methods : In prospective randomize trial , investigator investigate efficacy Biofeedback ( manometric- assist anal relaxation , muscle coordination simulate defecation training ) , either sham feedback therapy ( Sham ) standard therapy ( diet , exercise , laxatives ; Standard ) 77 subject ( 69 woman ) dyssynergic defecation . Primary outcome measure include presence dyssynergia , balloon expulsion time , number complete spontaneous bowel movement ( CSBM ) , global bowel satisfaction . Data analyze per protocol .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Biofeedback Therapy Dyssynergic Defecation
DOC.criteria: Patients include fulfilled Rome II criterion functional constipation , attempt defecation demonstrate dyssynergic pattern defecation , either prolong difficulty expel simulated stool ( > 1 minute ) prolong delay ( > 20 % marker retention ) colonic transit . They require evidence structural metabolic disease could cause constipation , assess colonoscopy/barium enema routine hematological , biochemical thyroid function test . Patients take drug know constipating , example opioids either exclude ask discontinue drug prior enrollment . Other exclusion criterion include : severe cardiac renal disease , previous gastrointestinal , spinal pelvic surgery except cholecystectomy , hysterectomy appendectomy , neurologic disease multiple sclerosis , stroke spinal injury , impaired cognizance ( minimental score < 15 ) , legal blindness , pregnancy , rectal prolapse , anal fissure , alternate constipation diarrhea .
